name: Argon Assault (Jason Warrick)
description:
Made as part of the GameDev.tv beginner Unity 3D course

PLAYED BEST WITH A CONTROLLER

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys / Joystick  - Movement
  • Space / South Face Button (X / A) - Fire
  • Escape - Quit

Objective:

Eliminate as many enemies as possible!

Notes:

I've only tested this with a PS4 controller, if it doesn't work with an XBox one let me know!
